snippet: A man attacked security officers at New Orleans airport with wasp spray and a machete before being shot by a sheriff’s deputy stationed at the airport, officials said.
abstract: Richard White is shot and seriously wounded by police officer after attacking Transportation Security Administration officers inside Louis Armstrong International Airport, outside New Orleans, with wasp spray and machete; motive behind attack is unknown.

byline.original: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON and LIAM STACK
byline.contributor: Campbell Robertson reported from New Orleans, and Liam Stack from New York.

lead_paragraph: A man attacked security officers at New Orleans airport with wasp spray and a machete before being shot by a sheriff’s deputy stationed at the airport, officials said.

headline.main: Panic at New Orleans Airport as Police Shoot Man Who Attacked T.S.A. Officers
headline.print_headline: Police Shoot Man in Attack at New Orleans Airport
